meanings.sent1: I holloed for my friend to come over.
meanings.sent2: She holloed across the field to get the attention of her dog.
meanings.sent3: The children holloed with joy when they saw the ice cream truck.
meanings.sent4: The coach holloed instructions to the players on the field.
meanings.sent5: The hiker holloed for help when he got lost in the woods.

meanings.sent1: The hollo from the top of the mountain echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent2: His hollo could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The sudden hollo startled the birds in the trees.
meanings.sent4: The crowd's hollo of excitement filled the stadium.
meanings.sent5: The hunter's hollo alerted the other hunters of his location.
